text: My tears are like anchors that sink my heart to the depths of sadness.
author: null

text: Pain is the only thing that's telling me I'm still alive.
author: null

text: The saddest thing in the world is loving someone who used to love you.
author: null

text: I feel lost inside myself.
author: null

text: I'm not okay, but I'll smile anyways.
author: null

text: It's hard to forget someone who gave you so much to remember.
author: null

text: My heart is too heavy to carry alone.
author: null

text: My heart is shattered into a million pieces.
author: null

text: I wish I could turn back time and change everything.
author: null

text: Sometimes, you have to smile to keep from crying.
author: null

text: The worst feeling is not being lonely, it's being forgotten by someone you could never forget.
author: null

text: I'm trying to be happy again, but it's so hard when all I can think about is you.
author: null

text: I miss the person I used to be.
author: null

text: Sadness is when you look into the mirror and don't recognize the person staring back at you.
author: null

text: You never know how strong you are until being strong is the only choice you have.
author: Bob Marley

text: Sometimes, it's easier to pretend you don't care than to admit that it's killing you.
author: null

text: I'm not crying because of you, you're not worth it. I'm crying because my delusion of who you were was shattered by the truth of who you are.
author: null

text: It's hard to forget someone who gave you so much to remember.
author: null

text: When you are in love and you get hurt, it's like being cut.
author: null

text: It's hard to look at the brighter side when everything seems to be dark.
author: null

text: Tears come from the heart, not from the brain.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

text: The only thing worse than being alone is being with someone who makes you feel alone.
author: null

text: I've cried so much that I'm not even sad anymore, I'm just empty.
author: null

text: You can't keep hurting a person and expect them to keep loving you.
author: null

text: Sometimes, it's easier to be alone than to be with someone who doesn't understand you.
author: null

text: Sometimes, it's better to be alone than to be with someone who doesn't appreciate you.
author: null

text: Every heart has its own pain. Only the way of expressing it is different.
author: null

text: The worst feeling is when you can't love anyone else, because your heart still belongs to the one who broke it.
author: null

text: I'm tired of feeling so alone.
author: null

text: You can't change how people feel about you, so don't try. Just live your life and be happy.
author: null

text: It's sad how people become what they had promised they never will.
author: null

text: The saddest thing is when you are feeling really down, you look around and realize that there is no shoulder for you.
author: null

text: I didn't lose you. You lost me. You'll search for me inside of everyone you're with and I won't be found.
author: null

text: Sometimes, it's better to be alone than to be with someone who doesn't deserve you.
author: null

text: I'm just a ghost of the person I used to be.
author: null

text: The pain never truly goes away, but it does get easier to bear.
author: null

text: My heart is broken, but I know it will heal with time.
author: null

text: Sometimes the saddest people smile the brightest.
author: null

text: It hurts to love someone who doesn't love you back.
author: null

text: I'm not okay, but I will be.
author: null

text: There's a difference between missing someone and wanting them back.
author: null

text: Tears are the words my heart can't say.
author: null

text: I don't want to be alone, but I don't want to be with anyone else.
author: null

text: The hardest part of goodbye is knowing you'll never say hello again.
author: null

text: I'm drowning in a sea of sadness and I can't seem to find my way back to shore.
author: null

text: Even the strongest hearts can break.
author: null

text: It's hard to forget someone who gave you so much to remember.
author: null

text: My heart is shattered into a million pieces, and I don't know how to put it back together.
author: null

text: I thought you were my forever, but forever came to an end.
author: null

text: Sometimes it's better to be alone than to be with someone who doesn't appreciate you.
author: null

text: I'm tired of pretending I'm okay when I'm not.
author: null

text: I gave you my heart, and you broke it into a million pieces.
author: null

text: I thought I had it all, but I was missing the most important thing...you.
author: null

text: It's hard to move on when every song reminds you of them.
author: null

text: They say time heals all wounds, but I don't think this pain will ever go away.
author: null

text: I don't know how to live without you.
author: null

text: I'm hurting, but I know I'll be okay in the end.
author: null

text: It's better to have loved and lost than to never have loved at all.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

text: My heart is heavy, but I know I'll find a way to carry on.
author: null

text: The worst kind of pain is when you're smiling just to stop the tears from falling.
author: null

text: I didn't know how much I loved you until you were gone.
author: null

text: It's okay to cry, it's okay to be sad. You don't always have to be strong.
author: null

text: I never knew heartbreak until I met you.
author: null

text: I wish I could turn back time and make things right.
author: null

text: Sometimes the pain is too much to bear, but I know I'll get through it.
author: null

text: They say love is a gamble, but I never thought I'd lose everything.
author: null

text: My heart is in a million pieces, but I know it will mend with time.
author: null

text: It hurts to see you with someone else, but I know I have to let you go.
author: null

text: I miss you more than words could ever say.
author: null

text: I thought we were forever, but forever came too soon.
author: null

text: I never knew heartbreak until I lost you.
author: null

text: I can't help but wonder if you ever loved me at all.
author: null

text: You may have broken my heart, but you'll never break my spirit.
author: null

text: I gave you everything, but it still wasn't enough.
author: null

text: I never thought I'd have to say goodbye to you.
author: null

text: I'm trying to move on, but my heart won't let me.
author: null

text: Love can be the most wonderful thing, but it can also be the most painful.
author: null

text: I never knew heartbreak until I had to say goodbye to you.
author: null

text: I never knew that heartbreak could physically hurt so much.
author: null

text: It hurts to breathe because every breath I take reminds me of what I've lost.
author: null

text: Sometimes the person who's always there for everyone else needs someone to be there for them too.
author: null

text: I thought I could handle the pain, but it turns out I was just good at hiding it.
author: null

text: I keep telling myself that I'll be okay, but the truth is, I don't know if I will be.
author: null

text: It's hard to hold on to something that was never really there in the first place.
author: null

text: Sometimes, all you can do is lie in bed, and hope to fall asleep before you fall apart.
author: William C. Hannan

text: I'm not sure what hurts more, the fact that you're gone or the fact that I'm still here.
author: null

text: The saddest thing about love is that it never lasts, but the happiest thing about it is the memories it leaves behind.
author: null

text: It's sad when you realize you aren't as important to someone as you thought you were.
author: null

text: I'm trying to be okay, I really am. But some days, it's just so hard.

text: The worst kind of pain is when you're smiling just to stop the tears from falling.

text: It's hard to forget someone who gave you so much to remember.

text: The worst feeling is not being lonely, it's being forgotten by someone you could never forget.

text: It's sad when you realize you've been fooled by someone you thought you knew.

text: I never knew that something as simple as a smile could be so painful to lose.
author: null

text: I'm not okay, but I'm trying to be. And I guess that's all that really matters.

text: It's hard to move on when every time you think about letting go, something reminds you of what you had.
author: null

text: It's hard to be happy when someone you care about is unhappy.

text: The worst part about being lied to is knowing you weren't worth the truth.

text: It's hard to forget someone who gave you so much to remember.

text: It's hard to explain the feeling of missing someone who was never really yours.

text: It's hard to accept that some things are never meant to be.

text: I'm not sure what's worse: missing someone or pretending not to.

text: It's hard to move on when you're still holding onto the memories.

text: It's sad when you realize that the person you care about most in the world is the one who's hurting you the most.

text: The hardest thing about letting go is realizing that the other person already did.

text: I'm not sure if I'm crying because of you or because of the person I thought you were.

text: It's hard to forget someone who was once all you ever wanted.

text: It's hard to hold onto someone who doesn't want to be held.

text: It's hard to move on when you're still in love with someone.
